long_description: The sleek Yurbuds Signature Series earbuds feature premium sound quality, reflective and tangle-resistant cloth cords and a 1-button microphone system with track and call control. Sweat- and water-resistant earbuds are ergonomically designed to stay securely in place, with hour-after-hour comfort. Yurbuds Signature Series earbuds allow you to hear ambient noise, helping you maintain awareness of your surroundings during outdoor activity.
short_description: The sleek Yurbuds Signature Series earbuds feature premium sound quality, reflective and tangle-resistant cloth cords and a 1-button microphone system with track and call control.
